com.neovisionaries.bluetooth.ble.advertising

Class LocalName

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neovisionaries.bluetooth.ble.advertising.ADStructure
      • com.neovisionaries.bluetooth.ble.advertising.LocalName
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class LocalName
extends ADStructure
    An AD structure of type "Shortened Local Name" (type = 0x08) and "Complete Local Name" (type = 0x09).
    Since:
    1.3
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isShortened

        public boolean isShortened()
        Check if this AD Structure represents "Shortened Local Name".

        This method returns true when ADStructure.getType() returns 0x08.

        Returns:
        true if this AD structure represents "Shortened Local Name".

        public boolean isComplete()
        Check if this AD Structure represents "Complete Local Name".

        This method returns true when ADStructure.getType() returns 0x09.

        Returns:
        true if this AD structure represents "Complete Local Name".
